_input_keys_help_: Object IDs with the JSON data to be converted (will be converted into a new object under this adapter with states for every JSON parameter)
_en_write_back_help_: If this option is enabled, changes to the states of this adapter will be written back to the corresponding source object in JSON format (optionally with a suffix to not overwrite the original object).
_suffix_help_: Suffix for writing changed states back to JSON format (e.g. for mqtt2zigbee, this is 'set' (/device/set))
